Plot: Travolta appears as Scott Barnes, an alcoholic turned social worker who trying to rescue a kid named Tommy (played by Lawrence) from a brutal, vicious Crack Street Gang when he finds out he has begun selling crack in an organization called YIP, run by Carlos (Benjamin Bratt). Héctor Elizondo has a part as Lieutenant Ortega.The opening credits state that Chains of Gold is "based on actual events", though details of the actual events themselves remain difficult to find and come across.The film was shot in Miami, Florida, USA. It is the only film written by twice nominated Academy Award actor John Travolta.
starring: John Travolta Marilu Henner Héctor Elizondo Joey Lawrence Benjamin Bratt Tammy Lauren
